featured.title: LensVision AI Virtual Try-On
featured.description: Revolutionary AI-powered virtual try-on system using computer vision and 3D rendering. Experience the future of online shopping with real-time clothing visualization.
featured.longDescription: LensVision represents the cutting edge of e-commerce technology, combining TensorFlow's machine learning capabilities with Three.js 3D rendering to create an immersive virtual try-on experience. The system uses advanced computer vision algorithms to map clothing items onto users in real-time.

featured.title: GhostMind AI Agent Framework
featured.description: Intelligent automation framework that orchestrates AI agents to handle complex workflows. The Mind Hacker's secret weapon for system automation.
featured.longDescription: GhostMind is an advanced AI agent framework designed to automate complex business processes. It features intelligent task routing, multi-agent collaboration, and seamless integration with various APIs and systems.
